Header.title: We are Connecting the Disconnected business
Header.paragraph: We are building a revolutionized travel solution, that connects all the disconnected high potential travel businesses

About.paragraph: We are building a revolutionized travel solution, which connects all the disconnected high potential travel businesses. Travel Mergers provides a platform to promote your products/services to all the potential customers around to globe. This platform also helps you to source product/services from other suppliers to meet your customer need. So, Travel Mergers platform not only help you to connect new customers everyday but also empower you with high number of suppliers all over the world. This is a collaborative platform to do business with reduced operational cost.
Why: Connect customers online, with no time
On board new customers around the globe
Perform business with low operational cost
Always get updated with travel updates/news
Why2: Real time work with multiple suppliers
Add emerging service line to your business
Get real-time alerts on customer activity
Get real time alerts of flight status
Get integrated with popular travel APIs

Services.name: Web Development
Services.text: We are experts in building and managing your website. We optimize your site, so that it can respond to your customer fast.

Services.name: e-Commerce Application
Services.text: e-Commerce portal is special kind of service line and needs different approach in developing them. We have some successful implementation of e-Commerce portal.

Services.name: Cloudification
Services.text: We can transform your existing in-house/shared hosted application into cloud enable services. That way you can scale your application based on customer load. This way you can optimize your IT spending.

Services.name: API Integration
Services.text: We already integrated multiple APIs into our platform and keep working in integrating more into it. If you have any special kind of travel APIs, then can suggest us and we can integrate them for your use.

Services.name: On-line Flight Booking
Services.text: We already integrated with TBO, which allow user to book flight real-time.

Services.name: Reporting/Analytics
Services.text: We prepared some basic analytics into our platform. We are open to hear from our user to add more for their need. Idea is to provide all the insights about your business into your finger tips.

Features.title: Promote Your Business
Features.text: Our platform helps to promote your travel business online. Our platform helps to add wings to your product/serviecs, so that it can be heard by customers around the world

Features.title: Broadcast Offerings
Features.text: Even you some excellent products, until you have a right platform to promote, that of no use. Our platform is make exactly that. We help you to listen to your customer, so that you can position your product/service in a better way

Features.title: Collaborate as Team
Features.text: Our platform helps to collaborate with others. Our platform enrich you to complement with others rather compete with them. You will be getting new source of revenue in our platform, whcih will enhance your business

Features.title: Reduced Cost
Features.text: Every business tries to reduce cost. That can only be done if you reach more customers, increase revinue, add new service lines etc. in no time. Our platform also helps you to manage everything online, which bring down your operational cost.
